price: Certamente, fá-los-á entrar em um lugar, de que se agradarão. E, por certo, Allah é Onisciente, Clemente.
arabic: لَيُدۡخِلَنَّهُم مُّدۡخَلٗا يَرۡضَوۡنَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: layud'khilannahum mud'khalan yarḍawnahu wa-inna al-laha laʿalīmun ḥalīmun
